title: 【急】PlayerPoints 点卷插件，不能使用数据库
author: 先生爱小生
txt_content:
PlayerPoints 点卷插件
版本是2.1.4

和2.1.5

服务端版本是1.8.8

然后就是 http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-461244-1-1.html  下载的插件

前置数据库最新版本就是7.1

然后填好数据库之后。

输入/p lead 

后台刷出一堆报错。无法读取！怎么解决啊？。。

[14:15:32] [Server thread/WARN]: Unexpected exception while parsing console command "p lead" org.bukkit.command.CommandException: Unhandled exception executing command 'p' in plugin PlayerPoints v2.1.5-SNAPSHOT         at org.bukkit.command.PluginCommand.execute(PluginCommand.java:46) ~[spigot-1.8.8-R0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar:git-Spigot-db6de12-7911b3e]         at org.bukkit.command.SimpleCommandMap.dispatch(SimpleCommandMap.java:141) ~[spigot-1.8.8-R0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar:git-Spigot-db6de12-7911b3e]         at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.DedicatedServer.B(DedicatedServer.java:375) [spigot-1.8.8-R0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar:git-Spigot-db6de12-7911b3e]         at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.MinecraftServer.A(MinecraftServer.java:654) [spigot-1.8.8-R0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar:git-Spigot-db6de12-7911b3e]         at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:557) [spigot-1.8.8-R0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar:git-Spigot-db6de12-7911b3e]         at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.7.0_71] Caused by: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Invalid UUID string: shop         at java.util.UUID.fromString(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.7.0_71]         at 版本2.1.4和2.1.5都试过了

replies.author: 先生爱小生
replies.txt_content:
又TM的自己解决好了= =

魔改插件。

replies.author: CXi_Chen
replies.txt_content: 数据库与核心的冲突，核心更新或者安装前置即可。
